column1: Uchi////We were celebrating a new job. Uchi did so much to take care of us. We were brought not one
column3: but three dishes that were complimentary to help celebrate. Total value of the 3 dishes we were surprised with was probably $40-$45. We were blown away that we would be given these dishes as gifts because they were expensive. They were also excellent and delicious and really added to our experience here. I really couldn't believe a restaurant would be that generous. It was so nice and we were so appreciative. This is a wonderful place to celebrate something big.
